recipe_name: Tuna steaks with sweet and sour sauce
author: Brian Turner
method: Heat the oil in a saucepan, add the pepper and onion, and fry gently over a medium heat for five minutes. Add the remaining sauce ingredients to the pan and simmer for ten minutes, then season, to taste, with sea salt and freshly ground black pepper. Meanwhile, for the tuna, place the butter and oil in a frying pan on a high heat. Season the tuna with salt and freshly ground black pepper and place into the pan and fry for 2-4 minutes on each side, until completely cooked through or cooked according to your preference. To serve, spoon the sauce on a plate and top with the tuna steak.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  ½ red pepper, chopped,  1 small onion, finely chopped,  1 tbsp white wine vinegar,  dash Tabasco sauce,  2 tbsp honey,  1 tsp sesame oil,  1 tbsp tomato ketchup,  50ml/2fl oz water,  sea salt and freshly ground black pepper,  15g/ ½oz butter,  1 tbsp olive oil,  140g/5oz tuna steak,  sea salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste
